query:
SELECT
            p.id,
            is_public,
            title,
            key,
            COALESCE(
                JSON_AGG(
                    JSON_BUILD_OBJECT(
                        'id', t.id,
                        'name', t.name
                    )
                ) FILTER (WHERE t.id IS NOT NULL), 
                '[]'::json
            ) as "tags!"
        FROM pages p
        LEFT JOIN pages_tags pt ON p.id = pt.page_id
        LEFT JOIN tags t ON pt.tag_id = t.id
        WHERE p.id = $1
        GROUP BY p.id
